channel.title: Requesting Ancients :$ shouldn't be too hard
channel.description: Im looking for a script that gives u ancients. ive seen on other people servers that they can doo ::magic 2, ::switch or talk to a dark mage. ANY of these ill use i don't mind. Im new to scripting so please make it laid out easy for me lol :$ oh and please move this if its in wrong topic sorry Thanks.

item.title: Requesting Ancients :$ shouldn't be too hard
item.dc:creator: @harvie harvie
item.description:
@harvie wrote:

yeah i thought it was in wrong forum. lol
well in my server which i recently got, everyone is a mod and everyone can spawn things. but when you do the ::mod 1 or 2, then u cant spawn things

sorry but im new to all these things and i can only get auto save to work and ive tried other things but nothing works

Read full topic
item.source: Requesting Ancients :$ shouldn't be too hard

item.title: Requesting Ancients :$ shouldn't be too hard
item.dc:creator: @Sepranem Sepranem
item.description:
@Sepranem wrote:

umm thats not a script, its a command, it has to do with the server itself, some servers only allow mods, staff, and admins to use ancients, while others allow it to everyone, it completely depends on the server, and by the way this should be in RS2 Private Server Development

Read full topic
